unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Comparing Skew in Binomial Distributions
question_text: From the given information, list the binomial distributions in order from the most normal to the most heavily skewed left. Binomial Distribution A: $n = 5,     p = 0.98$ Binomial Distribution B: $n = 10,  p = 0.75$ Binomial Distribution C: $n = 50,  p = 0.50$ Binomial Distribution D: $n = 50,   p = 0.75$
